text: The 2019 Asian Table Tennis Championships were held in Yogyakarta, Indonesia from 15 to 22 September 2019. Around 128 males and 100 females table tennis players competed in the singles, doubles and team events. ==Schedule== Five individual and two team events were contested. {| class="wikitable" |- |
